DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Therapeutic Massage Chronic Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Neck pain one common problem affect health Americans lead reason use complementary alternative medical ( CAM ) therapy . Therapeutic massage one popular CAM treatment neck pain , little known effectiveness . This study lay groundwork full-scale trial evaluate effectiveness therapeutic massage chronic neck pain . The study involve two phase . During Phase I , researcher develop pre-test key component randomize clinical trial . In Phase II , safety efficacy massage CNP evaluate . The change symptom , function , quality life massage self care group evaluate midway treatment , end treatment 6 month post randomization .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion exclusion criterion develop consultation medical expert neck pain several massage consultant
